name: freelancer
description: Website for freelancers with homepage and payments pages to securely receive payments for services

scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV=development}; if [ $NODE_ENV = 'production' ]; then npm run start:prod; else npm run start:dev; fi
scripts.start:dev: npm run start:dev:client & npm run start:dev:server
scripts.start:prod: if [ -e ./.env.prod ]; then . ./.env.prod; fi; npm run build; node ./bin/www
scripts.debug:start: export NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV=development}; if [ $NODE_ENV = 'production' ]; then npm run debug:start:prod; else npm run debug:start:dev; fi
scripts.debug:start:dev: . ./.env.dev; npm run start:dev:client & npm run debug:start:dev:server

author: Mark Smith
